channel.title: Alpha+ Steam Keys Now for Sale! $9.99 on our website via Card!
channel.description: Just got our site and click **[the pay button at the top-middle square](https://www.ThroneOfLies.com)**! **Not seeing this? Can't click this button?** You may be dealing with old cache. Try F5 to refresh the page, or [incognito](https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95464?source=gsearch&hl=en)/private mode (Chrome/Firefox). [color=red]**Note that keys are handed out **manually**, for now. This will be automated in the future. [Discord](https://discord.gg/gvNbRSB) is also required Alpha/Beta[/color] PayPal will likely be accepted later, but not yet.

item.title: Alpha+ Steam Keys Now for Sale! $9.99 on our website via Card!
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Just got our site and click the pay button at the top-middle square!

Not seeing this? Can’t click this button?

You may be dealing with old cache. Try F5 to refresh the page, or incognito/private mode (Chrome/Firefox).

**Note that keys are handed out manually, for now. This will be automated in the future. Discord is also required Alpha/Beta

PayPal will likely be accepted later, but not yet.

Read full topic
